metadata.title: CVE-2024-57900 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:ila: serialize calls to nf_register_net_hooks()syzbot found a race in ila_add_mapping() [1]commit 031ae72825ce ("ila: call nf_unregister_net_hooks() sooner")attempted to fix a similar issue.Looking at the syzbot repro, we have concurrent ILA_CMD_ADD commands.Add a mutex to make sure at most one thread is callingnf_register_net_hooks().[1] BUG: KASAN: slab-use-after-free in rht_key_hashfninclude/linux/rhashtable.h:159 [inline] BUG: KASAN: slab-use-after-free
